title: font of a 1984 book from University of Texas Press, Austin
content:
Hi,

I’m adding a Second Edition Preface to this book and would like to match the original font. For what it’s worth, the book is <cite>The Impact of Intervention</cite> by Bruce J. Calder, University of Texas Press, Austin, © 1984.

Identifont says the font is Elmhurst, but I don’t think that’s quite right. I’d also appreciate suggestions of fonts which are close.

Thanks,

Wangden

P.S. Sorry about the distortion created by the lens of my digital camera. I don’t have a scanner.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Calder\_sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Calder_sample.jpg) | 221.93 KB |
author: wngdn

comments.content: You’re looking at [Georg Trump](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Georg%20Trump)’s [Trump Mediaeval](http://web.archive.org/web/20060110045431/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.121023.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=24&sampleText=The+Impact+of+Intervention&sampleSize=32). Tracked very tightly if I might add.
